front.title: Constrained Join Proxy for Bootstrapping Protocols

abstract.t: This document defines a protocol to securely assign a Pledge to a domain, represented by a Registrar, using an intermediary node between Pledge and Registrar. This intermediary node is known as a "constrained Join Proxy". This document extends the work of [RFC8995] by replacing the Circuit- proxy between Pledge and Registrar by a stateless/stateful constrained (CoAP) Join Proxy. It relays join traffic from the Pledge to the Registrar.
